blocks.name: ccfilu
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the set of Cauchy filter bases.

blocks.name: df-cfilu
blocks.content: Define the set of Cauchy filter bases on a uniform space. A Cauchy filter base is a filter base on the set such that for every entourage ` v ` , there is an element ` a ` of the filter "small enough in ` v ` " i.e. such that every pair ` { x , y } ` of points in ` a ` is related by ` v ` ". Definition 2 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.13. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-cfilu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(ccfilu, cmpt(s0, cuni(crn(cust)), crab(s1, cfv(cfbas, cdm(cuni(cv(s0)))), wral(s2, cv(s0), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cxp(cv(s3), cv(s3)), cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-cfilu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ CauFilU =(s0 ∈ ⋃ ran(UnifOn)↦ { s1 ∈(fBas ` dom(⋃ s0))| ∀(s2 ∈ s0, ∃(s3 ∈ s1,(s3 × s3)⊆ s2))})
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
}

blocks.name: iscfilu
blocks.content: The predicate " ` F ` is a Cauchy filter base on uniform space ` U ` ". (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscfilu(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(ccfilu, c0)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitr4d(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccfilu, c0)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, cdm(cuni(c0)))), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccfilu, c0)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, cdm(cuni(c0)))), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0))))), wcel(c2, crab(hs0, cfv(cfbas, cdm(cuni(c0))), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))))
  eleq2d(c2, cfv(ccfilu, c0), crab(hs0, cfv(cfbas, cdm(cuni(c0))), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(cfv(ccfilu, c0), crab(hs0, cfv(cfbas, cdm(cuni(c0))), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))), wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cust))))
  elrnust(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs1, c0, cuni(crn(cust)), ccfilu, crab(hs0, cfv(cfbas, cdm(cuni(c0))), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0))))), crab(hs0, cfv(cfbas, cdm(cuni(cv(hs1)))), wral(s0, cv(hs1), wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))
  rabeqbidv(hs0, cfv(cfbas, cdm(cuni(cv(hs1)))), cfv(cfbas, cdm(cuni(c0))), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wral(s0, cv(hs1), wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))
  fveq2d(cfbas, cdm(cuni(cv(hs1))), cdm(cuni(c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  dmeqd(cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs1), c0)
  raleq(s0, cv(hs1), c0, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0))))
  df-cfilu(hs1, hs0, s0, s1)
  rabex(hs0, cfv(cfbas, cdm(cuni(c0))), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))
  fvex(cfbas, cdm(cuni(c0)))
  elrab(hs0, c2, cfv(cfbas, cdm(cuni(c0))), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))
  ralbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c2, wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0))))
  rexeq(s1, cv(hs0), c2, wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0)))
  anbi1d(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0)))), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, cdm(cuni(c0)))))
  eleq2d(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1), cfv(cfbas, cdm(cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)))
  fveq2d(cfbas, c1, cdm(cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)))
  ustbas2(c0, c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(crn(cust)))
  diff.hs1.c(crab(hs0, cfv(cfbas, cdm(cuni(c0))), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0))))))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfbas, cdm(cuni(cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cfbas, cdm(cuni(c0))))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iscfilu(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1)→(c2 ∈(CauFilU ` c0)↔(c2 ∈(fBas ` c1)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c2,(s1 × s1)⊆ s0)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitr4d(c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1), c2 ∈(CauFilU ` c0), (c2 ∈(fBas ` c1)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c2,(s1 × s1)⊆ s0))), (c2 ∈(fBas ` dom(⋃ c0))∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c2,(s1 × s1)⊆ s0))))
  syl6bb(c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1), c2 ∈(CauFilU ` c0), (c2 ∈(fBas ` dom(⋃ c0))∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c2,(s1 × s1)⊆ s0))), c2 ∈ { hs0 ∈(fBas ` dom(⋃ c0))| ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ hs0,(s1 × s1)⊆ s0))})
  eleq2d(c2, (CauFilU ` c0), { hs0 ∈(fBas ` dom(⋃ c0))| ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ hs0,(s1 × s1)⊆ s0))}, c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1))
  syl(c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1), (CauFilU ` c0)= { hs0 ∈(fBas ` dom(⋃ c0))| ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ hs0,(s1 × s1)⊆ s0))}, c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(UnifOn))
  elrnust(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs1, c0, ⋃ ran(UnifOn), ccfilu, { hs0 ∈(fBas ` dom(⋃ c0))| ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ hs0,(s1 × s1)⊆ s0))}, { hs0 ∈(fBas ` dom(⋃ hs1))| ∀(s0 ∈ hs1, ∃(s1 ∈ hs0,(s1 × s1)⊆ s0))})
  rabeqbidv(hs0, (fBas ` dom(⋃ hs1)), (fBas ` dom(⋃ c0)), hs1 = c0, ∀(s0 ∈ hs1, ∃(s1 ∈ hs0,(s1 × s1)⊆ s0)), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ hs0,(s1 × s1)⊆ s0)))
  fveq2d(cfbas, dom(⋃ hs1), dom(⋃ c0), hs1 = c0)
  dmeqd(⋃ hs1, ⋃ c0, hs1 = c0)
  unieq(hs1, c0)
  raleq(s0, hs1, c0, ∃(s1 ∈ hs0,(s1 × s1)⊆ s0))
  df-cfilu(hs1, hs0, s0, s1)
  rabex(hs0, (fBas ` dom(⋃ c0)), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ hs0,(s1 × s1)⊆ s0)))
  fvex(cfbas, dom(⋃ c0))
  elrab(hs0, c2, (fBas ` dom(⋃ c0)), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ hs0,(s1 × s1)⊆ s0)), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c2,(s1 × s1)⊆ s0)))
  ralbidv(s0, c0, hs0 = c2, ∃(s1 ∈ hs0,(s1 × s1)⊆ s0), ∃(s1 ∈ c2,(s1 × s1)⊆ s0))
  rexeq(s1, hs0, c2, (s1 × s1)⊆ s0)
  anbi1d(c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1), c2 ∈(fBas ` c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c2,(s1 × s1)⊆ s0)), c2 ∈(fBas ` dom(⋃ c0)))
  eleq2d(c2, (fBas ` c1), (fBas ` dom(⋃ c0)), c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1))
  fveq2d(cfbas, c1, dom(⋃ c0), c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1))
  ustbas2(c0, c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(⋃ ran(UnifOn))
  diff.hs1.c({ hs0 ∈(fBas ` dom(⋃ c0))| ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ hs0,(s1 × s1)⊆ s0))})
  diff.hs0.c((fBas ` dom(⋃ hs1)))
  diff.hs0.c((fBas ` dom(⋃ c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 = c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c2,(s1 × s1)⊆ s0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: cfilufbas
blocks.content: A Cauchy filter base is a filter base. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: cfiluexsm
blocks.content: For a Cauchy filter base and any entourage ` V ` , there is an element of the filter small in ` V ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cfiluexsm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccfilu, c0)), wcel(c3, c0)), wrex(s0, c2, wss(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0)), c3)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  mpd(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccfilu, c0)), wcel(c3, c0)), wrex(s0, c2, wss(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0)), c3)), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, c2, wss(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccfilu, c0)), wcel(c3, c0), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, c2, wss(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))))
  simplbda(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccfilu, c0)), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, c2, wss(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, c1)))
  iscfilu(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccfilu, c0)), wcel(c3, c0), wi(wral(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, c2, wss(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))), wrex(s0, c2, wss(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0)), c3))))
  rspcv(hs0, c3, c0, wrex(s0, c2, wss(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wrex(s0, c2, wss(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0)), c3)))
  rexbidv(s0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wss(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wss(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0)), c3))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c3, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c2, wss(cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0)), c3)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cfiluexsm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(CauFilU ` c0)∧ c3 ∈ c0)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(s0 × s0)⊆ c3))
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  mpd((c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(CauFilU ` c0)∧ c3 ∈ c0), ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(s0 × s0)⊆ c3), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(s0 × s0)⊆ hs0)))
  3adant3(c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1), c2 ∈(CauFilU ` c0), c3 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(s0 × s0)⊆ hs0)))
  simplbda(c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1), c2 ∈(CauFilU ` c0), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(s0 × s0)⊆ hs0)), c2 ∈(fBas ` c1))
  iscfilu(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2)
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1), c2 ∈(CauFilU ` c0), c3 ∈ c0, (∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(s0 × s0)⊆ hs0))→ ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(s0 × s0)⊆ c3)))
  rspcv(hs0, c3, c0, ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(s0 × s0)⊆ hs0), ∃(s0 ∈ c2,(s0 × s0)⊆ c3))
  rexbidv(s0, c2, hs0 = c3, (s0 × s0)⊆ hs0, (s0 × s0)⊆ c3)
  sseq2(hs0, c3, (s0 × s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ c2,(s0 × s0)⊆ c3))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm fmucndlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wceq(cima(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cop(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), cxp(c2, c2)), cxp(cima(c0, c2), cima(c0, c2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(cima(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cop(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), cxp(c2, c2)), cxp(cima(c0, c2), cima(c0, c2)), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, cop(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)))
  syl5eq(cima(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cop(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), cxp(c2, c2)), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, cop(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), crn(cres(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cop(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), cxp(c2, c2))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)))
  df-ima(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cop(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), cxp(c2, c2))
  rneqd(cres(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cop(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), cxp(c2, c2)), cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, cop(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)))
  sylancom(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wceq(cres(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cop(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), cxp(c2, c2)), cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, cop(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), wss(c2, c1))
  simpr(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1))
  resmpt2(s0, s1, c2, c1, c2, c1, cop(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  eqrdav(hs0, crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, cop(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), cxp(cima(c0, c2), cima(c0, c2)), cxp(universe, universe), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)))
  adantl(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, cop(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)))
  sseli(cv(hs0), crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, cop(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), cxp(universe, universe))
  mptru(wss(crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, cop(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), cxp(universe, universe)))
  fliftrel(hs0, crn(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, cop(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), universe, universe, cxp(c2, c2), cfv(c0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), wtru)
  rneqi(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, cop(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), cmpt(hs0, cxp(c2, c2), cop(cfv(c0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))))))
  eqcomi(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, cop(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), cmpt(hs0, cxp(c2, c2), cop(cfv(c0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))))))
  mpt2mpt(hs0, s0, s1, c2, c2, cop(cfv(c0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)))), cop(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  opeq12d(cfv(c0, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))

blocks.name: fmucnd
blocks.content: The image of a Cauchy filter base by an uniformly continuous function is a Cauchy filter base. Deduction form. Proposition 3 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.13. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Nov-2017.)

  simpld(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cfv(ccfilu, co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2))))), wcel(c3, cfv(cfbas, c2)), wral(hs2, co(c0, crest, cxp(c2, c2)), wrex(hs0, c3, wss(cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)))))
